sections.text: It shall be unlawful for any person whether heretofore licensed or not under the laws of this or any other State to practice naturopathy in this State. HISTORY: 1962 Code Section 56-901; 1956 (49) 1624.

Any person violating the provisions of this chapter shall, upon conviction, be guilty of a misdemeanor and be fined not exceeding five hundred dollars or be imprisoned for a period of not exceeding one year, or both, in the discretion of the court. HISTORY: 1962 Code Section 56-902; 1956 (49) 1624.
